chinese: 蔽芾甘棠、勿翦勿伐、召伯所茇。
english: [This] umbrageous sweet pear-tree; -Clip it not, hew it not down.Under it the chief of Shao lodged.

chinese: 蔽芾甘棠、勿翦勿敗、召伯所憩。
english: [This] umbrageous sweet pear-tree; -Clip it not, break not a twig of it.Under it the chief of Shao rested.

chinese: 蔽芾甘棠、勿翦勿拜、召伯所說。
english: [This] umbrageous sweet pear-tree; -Clip it not, bend not a twig of it.Under it the chief of Shao halted.
